    },

    "code-runner.executorMap": { //调参
        "c": "cd $dirWithoutTrailingSlash && gcc $fileName -o E:\\code\\C++\\exes\\$fileNameWithoutExt -std=c11 -lm&& E:\\code\\c++\\exes\\$fileNameWithoutExt",
        "cpp": "cd $dirWithoutTrailingSlash && g++ -Wall $fileName -o E:\\code\\C++\\exes\\$fileNameWithoutExt -std=c++11 -lm && E:\\code\\c++\\exes\\$fileNameWithoutExt"
    },
    "code-runner.preserveFocus": true, //运行时焦点不会跳回编辑器

//workspace setting
{
    "files.defaultLanguage": "cpp", // ctrl+N新建文件后默认的语言
    "editor.formatOnType": false, // 输入时就进行格式化，默认触发字符较少，分号可以触发
    "editor.snippetSuggestions": "top", // snippets代码优先显示补全
    "code-runner.runInTerminal": true, // 设置成false会在“输出”中输出，无法输入
    "code-runner.executorMap": {
        "c": "cd $dir && clang $fileName -o E:\\code\\C++\\exes\\$fileNameWithoutExt.exe -Wall -g -Og -static-libgcc -fcolor-diagnostics --target=x86_64-w64-mingw -std=c11 && E:\\code\\C++\\exes\\$fileNameWithoutExt",
        "cpp": "cd $dir && clang++ $fileName -o E:\\code\\C++\\exes\\$fileNameWithoutExt.exe -Wall -g -Og -static-libgcc -fcolor-diagnostics --target=x86_64-w64-mingw -std=c++17 && E:\\code\\C++\\exes\\$fileNameWithoutExt"
    }, // 设置code runner的命令行
    "code-runner.saveFileBeforeRun": true, // run code前保存
    "code-runner.preserveFocus": false, // 若为false，run code后光标会聚焦到终端上。如果需要频繁输入数据可设为false
    "code-runner.clearPreviousOutput": true, // 每次run code前清空属于code runner的终端消息
    // "C_Cpp.clang_format_sortIncludes": true, // 格式化时调整include的顺序（按字母排序）
    // "C_Cpp.intelliSenseEngine": "Default", // 可以为Default或Tag Parser，后者较老，功能较简单。具体差别参考cpptools扩展文档
    "C_Cpp.errorSquiggles": "Enabled", // 因为有clang的lint，所以关掉
    "C_Cpp.autocomplete": "Default",
    "C_Cpp.dimInactiveRegions": false,
    "files.associations": {
        "istream": "cpp",
        "array": "cpp",
        "atomic": "cpp",
        "*.tcc": "cpp",
        "bitset": "cpp",
        "cctype": "cpp",
        "cfenv": "cpp",
        "charconv": "cpp",
        "chrono": "cpp",
        "cinttypes": "cpp",
        "clocale": "cpp",
        "cmath": "cpp",
        "codecvt": "cpp",

        "csetjmp": "cpp",
        "csignal": "cpp",
        "cstdarg": "cpp",
        "cstddef": "cpp",
        "cstdint": "cpp",
        "cstdio": "cpp",
        "cstdlib": "cpp",
        "cstring": "cpp",
        "ctime": "cpp",
        "cuchar": "cpp",
        "cwchar": "cpp",
        "cwctype": "cpp",
        "deque": "cpp",
        "forward_list": "cpp",
        "list": "cpp",
        "unordered_map": "cpp",
        "unordered_set": "cpp",
        "vector": "cpp",
        "exception": "cpp",
        "fstream": "cpp",
        "functional": "cpp",
        "future": "cpp",
        "initializer_list": "cpp",
        "iomanip": "cpp",
        "iosfwd": "cpp",
        "iostream": "cpp",
        "limits": "cpp",
        "memory": "cpp",
        "mutex": "cpp",
        "new": "cpp",
        "numeric": "cpp",
        "optional": "cpp",
        "ostream": "cpp",

        "scoped_allocator": "cpp",
        "shared_mutex": "cpp",
        "sstream": "cpp",

        "streambuf": "cpp",
        "string_view": "cpp",
        "system_error": "cpp",
        "thread": "cpp",
        "type_traits": "cpp",

        "typeinfo": "cpp",

}
//key bind setting
// 将按键绑定配置放入此文件中即可覆盖默认值
[
    {
        "key": "ctrl+j",
        "command": "editor.action.triggerSuggest",
        "when": "editorHasCompletionItemProvider && textInputFocus && !editorReadonly"
    },
    {
        "key": "ctrl+space",
        "command": "-editor.action.triggerSuggest",
        "when": "editorHasCompletionItemProvider && textInputFocus && !editorReadonly"
    },
    {
        "key": "ctrl+space",
        "command": "-toggleSuggestionDetails",
        "when": "suggestWidgetVisible && textInputFocus"
    },
    {
        "key": "ctrl+shift+j",
        "command": "workbench.action.togglePanel"
    },
    {
        "key": "ctrl+j",
        "command": "-workbench.action.togglePanel"
    },
    {
        "key": "ctrl+shift+j",
        "command": "-workbench.action.search.toggleQueryDetails",
        "when": "searchViewletVisible"
    },
    {
        "key": "ctrl+f5",
        "command": "-cmake.debugTarget",
        "when": "!inDebugMode"
    },
    {
        "key": "shift+f5",
        "command": "-cmake.launchTarget"
    },
    {
        "key": "ctrl+shift+v",
        "command": "-markdown.showPreview",
        "when": "editorLangId == 'markdown'"
    }, 
    {
        "key": "backspace",
        "command": "-deleteLeft",
        "when": "textInputFocus && !editorReadonly"
    },
    {
        "key": "backspace",
        "command": "deleteLeft",
        "when": "textInputFocus && !editorReadonly"
    },
    {
        "key": "shift+backspace",
        "command": "-deleteLeft",
        "when": "textInputFocus && !editorReadonly"
    },
    {
        "key": "ctrl+shift+z",
        "command": "-redo",
        "when": "textInputFocus && !editorReadonly"
    },
    {
        "key": "ctrl+shift+z",
        "command": "redo",
        "when": "textInputFocus && !editorReadonly"
    },
    {
        "key": "ctrl+y",
        "command": "-redo",
        "when": "textInputFocus && !editorReadonly"
    },
    {
        "key": "ctrl+r",
        "command": "-workbench.action.openRecent"
    },
    {
        "key": "ctrl+r",
        "command": "workbench.action.quickOpenRecent"
    },
    {
        "key": "ctrl+d ctrl+g",
        "command": "outline.focus"
    },
    {
        "key": "ctrl+shift+oem_5",
        "command": "-metaGo.jumpToBracket",
        "when": "editorTextFocus"
    },
    {
        "key": "shift+backspace",
        "command": "-metaGo.delete.softDelete",
        "when": "editorTextFocus"
    },
    {
        "key": "ctrl+i",
        "command": "-metaGo.selectLineDown",
        "when": "editorTextFocus"
    },
    {
        "key": "ctrl+shift+i",
        "command": "-metaGo.selectLineUp",
        "when": "editorTextFocus"
    },
    {
        "key": "alt+end",
        "command": "-metaGo.spaceBlockMoveDown",
        "when": "editorTextFocus"
    },
    {
        "key": "alt+home",
        "command": "-metaGo.spaceBlockMoveUp",
        "when": "editorTextFocus"
    },
    {
        "key": "shift+alt+end",
        "command": "-metaGo.spaceBlockSelectDown",
        "when": "editorTextFocus"
    },
    {
        "key": "shift+alt+home",
        "command": "-metaGo.spaceBlockSelectUp",
        "when": "editorTextFocus"
    },
    {
        "key": "alt+oem_1",
        "command": "-metaGo.goto",
        "when": "editorTextFocus"
    },
    {
        "key": "oem_comma oem_comma",
        "command": "metaGo.gotoBefore",
        "when": "amVim.mode!='INSERT'&&!editorInputFocus"
    },
    {
        "key": "ctrl+alt+oem_1",
        "command": "-metaGo.gotoBefore",
        "when": "editorTextFocus"
    },
    {
        "key": "shift+alt+oem_1",
        "command": "-metaGo.selection",
        "when": "editorTextFocus"
    },
    {
        "key": "alt+m",
        "command": "-metaGo.currentLineToCenter",
        "when": "editorTextFocus"
    },
    {
        "key":"alt+;",
        "command":"cursorEnd",
        "when":"editorTextFocus"
        // "when":"amVim.mode=='INSERT'&&amVim.mode!='INSERT'"
        // "when":"amVim.mode!='INSERT"
        // "when":"editorTextFocus"
    }

]
